entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 20 January 2023
